name: SouthernBank
0:
”Alexa, open Southern Bank”
”What is my balance?”
”What is the routing number?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: southern bank
des:
Southern Bank Voice Banking allows you to ask for account information and ask general questions using your voice! For specific account inquiries your customer will have to authenticate using the Four Digit Spoken Passcode. The financial information will be read aloud and/or displayed visually. Alexa, ask Southern Bank…

 …what is my balance?

 …what are all of my balances?

 …what is my Emergency Savings balance?

 …what is my checking account balance?
